entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
